Verses: 1 ivvidhamaaga, Naam Visuvaasaththinaale Needhimaangalaakkappattirukkirapadiyaal, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiyayesukiristhumoolamaai Dhevanidaththil Samaadhaanam Petrirukkirom.
2 avarmoolamaai Naam Indhak Kirubaiyil Piravesikkum Silaakkiyaththai Visuvaasaththinaal Petru Nilaikondirundhu, Dhevamagimaiyai Adaivomengira Nambikkaiyinaale Menmaipaaraattugirom.
3 adhumaaththiramalla, Ubaththiravam Porumaiyaiyum, Porumai Pareetchaiyaiyum, Pareetchai Nambikkaiyaiyum Undaakkugiradhendru Naangal Arindhu,
4 ubaththiravangalileyum Menmaipaaraattugirom.
5 melum Namakku Arulappatta Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Dheva Anbu Nammudaiya Irudhayangalil Ootrappattirukkirapadiyaal, Andha Nambikkai Nammai Vetkappaduththaadhu.
6 andriyum Naam Belanatravargalaayirukkumbodhe, Kuriththa Kaalaththil Kiristhu Akkiramakkaararukkaaga Mariththaar.
7 needhimaanukkaaga Oruvan Marikkiradhu Aridhu; Nallavanukkaaga Oruvelai Oruvan Marikkath Thunivaan.
8 naam Paavigalaayirukkaiyil Kiristhu Namakkaaga Mariththadhinaale, Dhevan Nammel Vaiththa Thamadhu Anbai Vilangappannugiraar.
9 ippadi Naam Avarudaiya Raththaththinaale Needhimaangalaakkappattirukka, Kobaakkinaikku Neengalaaga Avaraale Naam Ratchikkappaduvadhu Adhiga Nichchayamaame.

10 naam Dhevanukkuch Saththurukkalaayirukkaiyil, Avarudaiya Kumaaranin Maranaththinaale Avarudane Oppuravaakkappattomaanaal, Oppuravaakkappattapin Naam Avarudaiya Jeevanaale Ratchikkappaduvadhu Adhiga Nichchayamaame.
11 adhuvumallaamal, Ippozhudhu Oppuravaakudhalai Namakkuk Kidaikkappannina Nammudaiya Karththaraagiyayesu Kiristhumoolamaai Naam Dhevanaippatriyum Menmaipaaraattugirom.
12 ippadiyaaga, Ore Manushanaale Paavamum Paavaththinaale Maranamum Ulagaththile Piravesiththadhupolavum, Ellaa Manusharum Paavanjseydhapadiyaal, Maranam Ellaarukkum Vandhadhupolavum Idhuvumaayitru.
13 niyaayappiramaanam Kodukkappaduvadharku Munnum Paavam Ulagaththilirundhadhu; Niyaayappiramaanam Illaadhirundhaal Paavam Ennappadamaattaadhu.
14 appadiyirundhum, Maranamaanadhu Aadhaammudhal Mosevaraikkum, Aadhaamin Meerudhalukkoppaaip Paavanjseyyaadhavargalaiyum Aandukondadhu; Andha Aadhaam Pinbu Vandhavarukku Munnadaiyaalamaanavan.

15 aanaalum Meerudhalin Balan Kirubai Varaththin Balanukku Oppaanadhalla. Eppadiyenil, Oruvanudaiya Meerudhalinaale Anegar Mariththirukka, Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyum Yesukiristhu Ennum Ore Manushanudaiya Kirubaiyinaale Varum Eevum Anegarmel Adhigamaaip Perugiyirukkiradhu.

16 melum Oruvan Paavanjseydhadhinaal Undaana Theerppu Dhevan Arulum Eevukku Oppaanadhalla; Andhath Theerppu Ore Kutraththinimiththam Aakkinaikku Edhuvaayirundhadhu; Kirubaivaramo Anega Kutrangalai Neekki Needhivilangum Theerppukku Edhuvaayirukkiradhu.

17 allaamalum, Oruvanudaiya Meerudhalinaale Andha Oruvanmoolamaai, Maranam Aandukondirukka, Kirubaiyin Paripooranaththaiyum Needhiyaagiya Eevin Paripooranaththaiyum Perugiravargal Yesu Kiristhu Ennum Oruvaraale Jeevanai Adaindhu Aaluvaargalenbadhu Adhiga Nichchayamaame.
18 aagaiyaal Ore Meerudhalinaale Ellaa Manusharukkum Aakkinaikku Edhuvaana Theerppu Undaanadhupola, Ore Needhiyinaale Ellaa Manusharukkum Jeevanai Alikkum Needhikku Edhuvaana Theerppu Undaayitru.
19 andriyum Ore Manushanudaiya Keezhppadiyaamaiyinaale Anegar Paavigalaakkappattadhupola, Oruvarudaiya Keezhppadidhalinaale Anegar Needhimaangalaakkappaduvaargal.
20 melum, Meerudhal Perugumpadikku Niyaayappiramaanam Vandhadhu; Appadiyirundhum, Paavam Perugina Idaththil Kirubai Adhigamaaip Perugitru.
21 aadhalaal Paavam Maranaththukku Edhuvaaga Aandukondadhupola, Kirubaiyaanadhu Nammudaiyakarththaraagiya Yesu Kiristhuvin Moolamaai Needhiyinaale Niththiyajeevanukku Edhuvaaga Aandukondadhu.
